entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Grand Bank
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:25 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.0°C

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Fog patches developing in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022
